repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Consists of two microfilm reels of correspondence of various officials of the Chicago, Burlington, and Quincy Railroad outlining management's strategy for dealing with the 1977 strike.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists of two microfilm reels of correspondence of various officials of the Chicago, Burlington, and Quincy Railroad outlining management's strategy for dealing with the 1977 strike.
A negative copy is available upon request.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Don McMurry Papers on Microfilm #5655 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

controlaccess.persname: McMurry, Donald L. q (Donald Le Crone), 1890-1980.

did.unittitle: Pamphlets, news clippings, and correspondence from April 23, 1877 through December 15, 1877. Positive reel.
Correspondence from July 23, 1877 through July 31, 1877. Positive reel.
